plot: When all the fast food restaurants in Springfield become healthy, Homer turns to the last bastion of greasy food for comfort; Lisa must find a good news story when her school radio station is in jeopardy.

All of Homers favorite eating establishments in Springfield are all serving healthy food. He returns to only place that gave him solace and onto the road of desire to eat "Comfort Food" , when he was eight. Can Homer survive without greasy processed foods? How far will he go to save the last bastion of unhealthy foods?—stephen scialli
